xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Translations for the LiveTable found on QA.WebHome and the Space.WebHome of the test spaces qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.doc.title=Test qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.doc.space=Category qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.product=Latest product version tested qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.browsers=Browsers qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.databases=Databases qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.automated=Automated qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable._actions=Action qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.no.tests.execution.found=No test executions found qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable._actions.runTest=Run Test qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable._actions.delete=Delete Test qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.userType=User Type qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.emptyvalue=
# Translations for the LiveTable found on each TestPage and Product page qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.test=Name qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.product=Product qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.browser=Browsers qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.database=Databases qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.user=Tested By qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.date=Tested On qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.passed=Result qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.jira=Jira Issue qaapp.Custom.LiveTable._actions=Action
# Translations for the buttons from QA.WebHome qaapp.WebHome.addTest.button=Add Test qaapp.WebHome.hallOfFame.button=Hall Of Fame qaapp.WebHome.statistics.button=Statistics qaapp.WebHome.management.button=Management
# Translations for Management Page qaapp.Management.AddTest.button=Add new Test qaapp.Management.AddProduct.button=Add new Product Version qaapp.Management.AddBrowser.button=Add new Browser qaapp.Management.AddDatabase.button=Add new Database
# Translations for the Add Test form qaapp.AddTest.button=Add a new test qaapp.AddTest.testName.label=Test Name qaapp.AddTest.testSpace.label=Test Space
# Translations in the Add Product form qaapp.AddProduct.button=Add a new product qaapp.AddProduct.productName.label=Product Name qaapp.AddProduct.productVersion.label=Product Version
# Translations in the Add Browser form qaapp.AddBrowser.button=Add a new browser qaapp.AddBrowser.browserName.label=Browser Name qaapp.AddBrowser.browserVersion.label=Browser Version
# Translations in the Add Database form qaapp.AddDatabase.button=Add a new database qaapp.AddDatabase.databaseName.label=Database Name qaapp.AddDatabase.databaseVersion.label=Database Version
